verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have, are <S%H935>come<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>
And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7097>some<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> even <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3322>presented<s%> them to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H4639>occupation?<s%> And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H6629><s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we, and <S%H1571>also<s%> our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> morever to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> For to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> are we <S%H935>come;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for their <S%H6629>flocks;<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> to you:

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you; in the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> make your <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell;<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%> let them <S%H3427>dwell:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> any <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>activity<s%> among them, then <S%H7760>make<s%> them <S%H8269>rulers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H4735>cattle.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3113>old<s%> are you?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%> are an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> have the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H1961>been,<s%> and have not <S%H5381>attained<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4033>pilgrimage.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>placed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them a <S%H272>possession<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7486>Rameses,<s%> as <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3557>nourished<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household,<s%> with <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H2945>families.<s%>

And there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>sore,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3856>fainted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for the <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7666>bought:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And when <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H8552>failed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H3899>bread:<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die<s%> in your <S%H5048>presence?<s%> for the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H656>fails.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> your <S%H4735>cattle;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you for your <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H656>fail.<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> in exchange for <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and for the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and for the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and for the <S%H2543>asses:<s%> and he <S%H5095>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> for that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

When that <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8552>ended,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to him the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We will not <S%H3582>hide<s%> it from my <S%H113>lord,<s%> how that our <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H8552>spent;<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> also <S%H413>has<s%> our <S%H4735>herds<s%> of <S%H929>cattle;<s%> there is not ought <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> but our <S%H1472>bodies,<s%> and our <S%H127>lands:<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> shall we <S%H4191>die<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we and our <S%H127>land?<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> us and our <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and we and our <S%H127>land<s%> will be <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> that the <S%H127>land<s%> be not <S%H3456>desolate.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them: so the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's.<s%>

And as for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H5674>removed<s%> them to <S%H5892>cities<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> thereof.

<S%H7535>Only<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> he not; for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had a <S%H2706>portion<s%> assigned them of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them: <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H4376>sold<s%> not their <S%H127>lands.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7069>bought<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> and your <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> <S%H1887>see,<s%> here is <S%H2233>seed<s%> for you, and you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H127>land.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in the <S%H8393>increase,<s%> that you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> shall be your own, for <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and for your <S%H400>food,<s%> and for them of your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and for <S%H398>food<s%> for your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones.

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> You have saved our <S%H2421>lives:<s%> let us <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> and we will be <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H2706>law<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> should have the <S%H2569>fifth<s%> part, <S%H7535>except<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> which <S%H1961>became<s%> not <S%H6547>Pharaoh's.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> and they had <S%H270>possessions<s%> therein, and <S%H6509>grew,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> so the whole <S%H3117>age<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>time<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> must <S%H4191>die:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H7760>put,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with me; <S%H6912>bury<s%> me not, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

But I will <S%H7901>lie<s%> with my <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and you shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> me out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in their burial <S%H6913>plot.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7650>Swear<s%> to me. And he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him. And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself on the <S%H4296>bed's<s%> <S%H7218>head.<s%>
